title: U.S. and Iran to Hold Talks in Oman on Friday
summary_full: The White House confirmed a meeting would take place after days of conflicting reports on the talks’ timing, location and format.
summary_public: The White House confirmed a meeting would take place after days of conflicting reports on the talks’ timing, location and format.
